person.persName: Curran Pope (Colonel of the 5th Kentucky Infantry)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, soldier. Louisville native. Son of Worden Pope and Elizabeth Taylor Thruston Pope. Married Matilda Prather Jacob Pope. Father of John J. Pope, Patrick H. Pope, and Mary Tyler Pope. Graduated from the United States Military Academy at West Point in 1834. Second lieutenant in the United States artillery in 1834. Assistant engineer on the Kentucky River and Cumberland River in 1835. Clerk of the Jefferson County Court for seventeen years. Colonel of the Fifth Kentucky Infantry. Wounded at the Battle of Perryville on October 6, 1862. Died on November 5, 1862.
